parts.data: SoftLayer, an IBM company, offers a unified platform that gives you cloud computing any way you want it, deployed on demand, with a single pane of glass for systems management (one portal; one Application programming interface). IBM is currently recruiting for Server Build Technician's to join the SoftLayer team. Essential Duties: Rack, build, cable, configure, and provision Intel and Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) servers Rack, cable, and deploy Cisco Layer 2 networking equipment Troubleshoot, test, quality assurance of server hardware Professionally resolve hardware issues via trouble ticket Required Basic knowledge in Computer Hardware English: Fluent Preferred High School Diploma/GED
parts.name: Job description
